dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 Monthly Climatology for the 20th Century (New et al.)
title: SAFARI 2000 Monthly Climatology for the 20th Century (New et al.)
summary: This is a data set of mean monthly surface climate data over Southern Africa for nearly all of the twentieth century. The data set is gridded at 0.5-degree latitude/longitude resolution and includes seven variables: precipitation, mean temperature, diurnal temperature range, wet-day frequency, vapour pressure, cloud cover, and ground-frost frequency.

citation: Mwale, D. and T.Y. Gan. 2010. Integrating Wavelet Empirical Orthogonal Functions and Statistical Disaggregation for Predicting Weekly Runoff for the Upper Kafue Basin in Zambia, Africa. Journal of Hydrologic Engineering. 15(10):822-833.
